doc.knownrelatives: Warren Kenneth Worthington Sr. (father, deceased), Warren Kenneth Worthington Jr. (brother, deceased), Kathryn Worthington (sister-in-law, deceased), Warren Kenneth Worthington III (Archangel, nephew), unidentified nephew
significantissues: Had brother killed, world conquest scheme foiled by Angel, seemingly killed (Ka-Zar #2-3/Marvel Tales #30, 1970/1971)
sought family fortune by marrying Kathryn, poisoned her, opposed X-Men, defeated by Angel, arrested (X-Men: The Hidden Years #13-16, 2000-2001)
